CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 21, 1955, page 25, reads: "At Herron Hill 'Spring Carnival' - This Herron Hill Girls Chorus was one of the featured attractions when the Herron Hill Junior High School Parent Teacher Association held its 'Spring Carnival' last Friday. The chorus was under the direction of Mrs. Carolyn Grant, gym teacher. Instrumentalists on the program were under the direction of William Lewis, Herron Hill bandmaster. Mary Dee, Mamie Hamilton, interpretive dancer; "Shorts" Davis, tap dancer, and Leroy Brown and His Brown Buddies donated their services."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of girls and young women, some wearing dance costumes with cat ears and tap shoes, posed on stage with landscape backdrop, for Herron Hill Junior High Parent Teacher Association Spring Carnival
